summary: Optional object with additional parameters for query results.

properties.name: count
properties.summary: The number of how many results should be returned.

properties.name: sort
properties.summary:
A list of attributes to sort on, as well as direction For example: 

[{attribute:"price, descending: true}].

If the sort parameter is omitted, then the natural order of the store may be

applied if there is a natural order.

properties.name: start
properties.summary: The first result to begin iteration on
